articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: PwC Australia vows 'severe' consequences for tax leak staff - DW (English)
articles.description: The acting CEO of the Australian branch of PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) has faced a parliamentary inquiry, her first public appearance since her predecessor resigned over a tax-avoidance and conflict of interest scandal.
articles.content: The acting CEO of PwC (PricewaterhouseCoopers) Australia, Kristin Stubbins, told a parliamentary inquiry on Monday that staff will face "severe" consequences if they are found to have acted improperl… [+5777 chars]
